content: This section is only available in the desktop version

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a warning message indicating that certain content is only available in the desktop version. It is displayed on a component (BreakpointWarning) when specific conditions are met, such as being in a small window or having mobile availability disabled.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "هذا القسم متاح فقط في إصدار أجهزة الحاسوب" is a literal translation and could be improved for natural flow in Arabic. While technically correct, it's a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: هذا القسم متوفر فقط في تطبيق سطح المكتب.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'десктоп' is an anglicism and while commonly understood, a more natural Bulgarian equivalent would be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Този раздел е наличен само в настолна версия

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Այս բաժինը հասանելի է միայն աշխատասեղանի տարբերակով' is a literal translation that doesn't fully convey the meaning of 'This section is only available in the desktop version.' A more natural Armenian translation would be something like 'This section is only available on the desktop version' or 'This section can only be used on the desktop version'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternative translations such as 'Այս բաժինը հասանելի է միայն համակարգչային տարբերակով' or 'Այս բաժինը կարող է օգտագործվել միայն համակարգչային տարբերակով։'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ພາກສ່ວນນີ້ມີຢູ່ໃນສະບັບ desktop ເທົ່ານັ້ນ' is a literal translation and doesn't flow naturally in Lao. While technically correct, it sounds awkward. A more natural phrasing would convey the meaning that the feature is not available on mobile devices.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ພາກສ່ວນນີ້ໃຊ້ໄດ້ໃນສະບັບຄອມພິວເຕີ້ເທົ່ານັ້ນ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the translation is understandable, 'Dana sekcja' is not the most natural phrasing in Polish. 'Ta sekcja' would be more common and idiomatic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ta sekcja jest dostępna wyłącznie w wersji na komputery stacjonarne

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'මෙම කොටස වැඩතල අනුවාදයේ පමණක් තිබේ' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'This section is only available in the desktop version.' It translates to something like 'This part is only in the desktop version.' The word 'only' is poorly represented and doesn't express restriction.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම කොටස Desktop අනුවාදය සඳහා පමණක් ලබා ගත හැකිය.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'වල' after ' අනුවාදය' is slightly awkward and less natural. While not strictly incorrect, it makes the sentence feel less fluid.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම කොටස Desktop අනුවාදය පමණක් ලබා ගත හැකිය.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes '版本' twice. It's redundant and makes the sentence slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 该部分仅可在桌面端使用
